code: import React,{useState,useMemo}from"react";import people from"../data/people.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function People(){const[query,setQuery]=useState("");const filteredPeople=useMemo(()=>{return people.filter(person=>person.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||person.title.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||person.research_interests.join(' ').toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()));},[query]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-6xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-[#cc0033] mb-6 text-center",children:"Lab Members"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search by name, title, or interest...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),className:"border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded w-full max-w-md"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:filteredPeople.map((person,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow rounded-xl p-5 border border-gray-200 text-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-bold mb-1",children:person.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1",children:person.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 mb-2",children:person.research_interests.join(', ')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:person.profile_link,className:"text-blue-600 hover:underline",target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:"Profile"})]},idx))})]});}
